Ask about ID#248376
This community is a sophisticated residence neighboring Houston’s desirable River Oaks neighborhood.
Indulge in all this signature destination provides: world-class shopping, high-end grocers, eclectic restaurants, renowned museums, historic parks, and relaxing spas.
An abundance of tailored amenities and comforts awaits your arrival.
Located minutes from downtown, this community lifestyle is yours to embrace.
WORLD-CLASS COMFORTS
Smoke-Free Community
Clubroom with bar, TVs, coffee bar, and full-size commercial kitchen with walk-in pantry for entertaining
Theater room with lounge seating and presentation capabilities
Business lounge with community WiFi, flex seating, WiFi printer access, and conference room with presentation capabilities
Top floor sky lounge with a full kitchen, TVs, and outdoor deck with splendid urban views
Resort-style pool with tanning ledge, cabanas, grills, and TVs
Courtyard with fire pit, fountain, grills, outdoor games, and swings
Athletic club with spin cycles, cardio, and strength equipment
Yoga studio with on-demand classes
Bike storage with repair station
Pet salon with grooming tables
Privately enclosed dog run
Controlled access parking garage with multiple electric car charging stations
On-site Personal Concierge with package and dry cleaning delivery
Walkable boutique retail stores
